properties.name: MSF, UNICEF and Samaritan's Purse are providing support for emergency health services at the isolation unit in Foya Hospital.
properties.description:
April 16

"On 16 april 2014 , with the logistical support of Samaritan’s Purse, UNICEF air-lifted a new batch of urgently
needed supplies of chlorine, plastic tarpaulins, sprayers and other materials to Lofa, where MSF is
providing support for emergency health services at the isolation unit in Foya Hospital. The delivery
came a day after MSF requested this support at the NTF meeting on 15 april 2014 ."

http://reliefweb.int/sites/reliefweb.int/files/resources/UNICEF%20Liberia%20SitRep16%20Ebola%20Viral%20Disease%2016Apr2014.pdf 


April 4

http://www.mohsw.gov.lr/documents/04april.pdf 

http://www.mohsw.gov.lr/documents/listing_of_items_frm_who.pdf 

3rd of april 2014  

Needs of protective materials to prevent nurses from directly coming in contact with the virus.

"Nurses and other health workers in the county are calling on government to provide protective materials to prevent them (nurses) from directly coming in contact with the virus. It is also reported that residents of Lofa and Nimba Counties are now taking preventive measures to avoid contracting the virus."

http://www.thenewdawnliberia.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=11322:13-nurses-quarantined-in-lofa&catid=46:health&Itemid=60

properties.name: Désinfection du domicile des 4 frères du commerçant de Dabola à Gbessia-Port
properties.description:
La famille des frères du commerçant défunt de Dabola qui avait transporté et inhumé son corps pour l'enterrement à Watalaga résidait ici. Une semaine après leur retour de funéraille, un de ses frères est tombé malade a été testé positif à Ebola à l'hopital Donka de Conakry. Leur domicile a été désinfecté. Les 4 frères ont été mis en quarantaine. Zone proche de l'aéroport.

http://www.leral.net/Ebola-en-Guinee-L-ambassadeur-senegalais-Leopold-Diouf-rassure_a109603.html

Ce laboratoire permettra de faire des analyses sur place pour les zones forestières et traitera également les échantillons de cas suspects des pays voisins (Liberia et Sierra Leone).

properties.name: Health workers are being provided with personal protective equipment to protect them while handling cases associated with Ebola.
Installation à Man  du comité régional ivoirien de surveillance, de prévention
properties.description:
Dans le cadre de la mise en place des mesures de prévention contre la fièvre Ebola, le préfet de région du Tonkpi a entretenu vendredi 28 march 2014  2014, l’ensemble de la population. Soro Kayaha Jérôme a dit a ses administrés que cette maladie qui n’a pas de remède est à nos frontières. C’est pourquoi, la capitale des 18 montagnes (Man) de part sa position frontalière a été choisie comme point focal de la lutte. C’est ainsi qu’un comité régional de surveillance, de prévention et de lutte, qu’il préside a été installé. 

http://www.connectionivoirienne.net/97969/cote-divoire-ebola-chasse-viande-brousse-interdites-man?utm_source=civ3&utm_medium=twitter
http://www.trust.org/item/20140328142329-9fo8w/

properties.name: SEREFO/CEREFO : Laboratoire mobile de haute sécurité pour tests Ebola / mobile high security laboratory for Ebola tests
properties.description:
16 april 2014 

The samples were also tested using real-time PCR at the newly established, mobile high security laboratory at the SEREFO Center for HIV and TB Training and Research, University of Bamako. Malian laboratory experts from the SEREFO Center, the National Institute of Public Health (INRSP), the Centre National d'Appui à la lutte contre la Maladie (CNAM), the National Blood Transfusion Centre (CNTS) and the Faculty of Medicine and Dentistry, University of Science, Technics and Technology, Bamako (FMOS) were trained in ebolavirus diagnosis by staff of the US National Institutes of Health (NIH).

http://www.afro.who.int/en/clusters-a-programmes/dpc/epidemic-a-pandemic-alert-and-response/outbreak-news/4100-ebola-virus-disease-west-africa-16-april-2014.html

5th of april 2014 

At the request of the MOHSW and WHO, the Metabiota Laboratory in Kenema, Sierra Leone, will install Real-Time Zaire ebolavirus-specific PCR, a pan-filo PCR, Lassa virus PCR, yellow fever and Marburg virus PCRs among other assays.  This technology is being transferred from its laboratory in Kenema, Sierra Leone.  Metabiota will also provide training to laboratory staff in Liberia.

http://www.afro.who.int/en/clusters-a-programmes/dpc/epidemic-a-pandemic-alert-and-response/outbreak-news/4079-ebola-virus-disease-west-africa-5-april-2014.html 

2nd april 2014  (4 april 2014  posted on this map)

"An up-to-date diagnostic testing for Ebola virus is urgently needed at the Kenema Government Hospital (KGH) to assist in the surveillance of the disease and the clinical care of patients"

http://www.salonepost.com/sp/news/articles/article191.asp 

27 march 2014 

A two man medical team from “METABIOTA” contracted by the United States Department of Defense has on Monday march 2014  24th, 2014, briefed Ambassador Bockari Kortu Stevens at the Embassy of Sierra Leone, as they proceed as first responders in Sierra Leone to investigate assess, evaluate, and help combat the Ebola virus that broke out in areas in the republic of Guinea that are near Sierra Leone. - See more at: http://www.sierraexpressmedia.com/archives/66315#sthash.EZ2TmCxG.dpuf 

http://www.sierraexpressmedia.com/archives/66315
properties.name: The Metabiota Laboratory in Kenema will install Real-Time Zaire ebolavirus-specific PCR.
